name: ABYSSAL
description:
A fast paced on-rails shooter that takes you down into the oceans of a fantastical world where you battle dangerous submarines and gargantuan bosses.

Fight intense submarine battles as Captain Oliver Belmarsh in this on-rails shooter from Nowhere Man Studios. This new title will have you traversing a beautiful underwater landscape with a steampunk twist. Your sub is equipped with an arsenal of powerful weapons that will rip through enemy attacks and bring down even the most well-armed flagship submarines. Play today!

Abyssal is a student project that was developed by a team of fifteen game design students in one semester for a game workshop class at the University of Central Florida.

Made in Unreal Engine 4.
